Journalist, BBC Shropshire

documents.title: headlines : man pursued by police dies in crash ; complaints over lack of affordable homes
text: our top stories this morning :
- man dies in a53 crash after being pursued by police
- claim that young people ca n't afford to live in villages
- cinema group to look at other options for arts venue
author: Andy Giddings
BBC Shropshire

documents.title: coroner verdict due following 'blood clot ' death
text: the shropshire coroner is set to deliver his conclusion this week on a young woman who died from a blood clot , after starting a course of the combined contraceptive pill .
charlotte foster , who was 23 and from newport , complained to her gp about breathing problems three weeks before she died .

documents.title: severe delays on the a489 in south shropshire
text: problems are being caused on the a489 , just north of craven arms , because of resurfacing works .
it 's affecting the stretch of road between the a49 and the junction with the b4370 at horderley .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: man killed in crash after police chase near market drayton
text: a man has been killed in a crash following a police pursuit on a major road near market drayton .
author: Shropshire Star

documents.title: starter home shortage pricing out young people in rural shropshire
text: young people are being forced to leave rural areas because of a lack of affordable housing .

the family of lara sproson-jones , who works at the stiperstones inn , put in planning permission for two starter homes which was refused , on the same land where larger homes were allowed to be built .
shropshire council says more than 100 parishes were put forward as part of the conservative government 's new right to buy scheme , which has just come into force .
what we need are smaller houses - one or two-bedroom houses are not available at all anymore
author: Joanne Gallacher
Political reporter, BBC Shropshire

documents.title: car crash victim was being followed by police
text: a man who died in a crash last night was being followed by a vehicle from west mercia police .
it happened on the a53 market drayton to newcastle road , after the car he was travelling in was in collision with another between the swan with two necks and baldwin 's gate .
the independent police complaints commission has been informed .

documents.title: weather : a dry start with one or two showers to come
text: it wo n't be as hot as last week , but there will be some sunshine , as well as some outbreaks of rain .
highs of 21c ( 75f ) .
author: Sara Blizzard
BBC Weather

documents.title: headlines : man dies in crash after police followed car ; complaints over lack of affordable homes
text: - a man dies in a crash after the car he was travelling in was being followed by a police vehicle
- young people are said to be priced out of staying in villages , due to a shortage of starter homes .
- a homeless charity appoints an outreach worker to help those living on shrewsbury 's streets .
author: Andrew Hewkin
Newsreader, BBC Shropshire

documents.title: ukip mep calls for prison reform
text: a ukip leadership hopeful and west midlands mep is calling for hardline prison reform - and wants inmates to pay £ 40,000 a year for their stay .
bill etheridge is calling for a string of changes , although he admitted to bbc wm his proposal would only work if convicts had assets .
he has also admitted he has never been inside a jail .
jails `` would probably work for people like him , '' he said , despite comments last week that prisons should be about `` punishment rather than rehabilitation '' .
author: Rob Mayor
Black Country Political Reporter, BBC WM

documents.title: delays caused by roadworks in shrewsbury and telford
text: there are n't too many problems on shropshire 's roads this morning , but expect delays due to temporary traffic lights on the a464 near shifnal .
there are also roadworks heading out of shrewsbury on to the a458 towards bridgnorth .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: good morning and welcome to our local live page
text: good morning from the bbc shropshire newsroom .
we 'll be bringing you all the latest news , sport , travel and weather updates for the county .
you can get in touch by email , twitter or by commenting on our facebook page .
author: Alex Seftel
BBC Local Live
